context: Namaste, yo hamro online event registration platform ho. tapai yaha event ko barema sabai details pauna saknuhunchha ra register garna saknuhunchha. Yedi kunai samasya cha bhane, kripaya hamlai contact garnuhos.
question: Maile event register garna khojda payment error ayo, ke garne?
response: Kripaya tapaiko internet connection check garnuhos ra feri kosis garnuhos. Yedi samasya fix hudaina bhane, hamlai email ma sampark garnuhos: support@example.com.

context: Hamro platform ma register garnu padhna pahila, event ka terms and conditions sabai padhera bujhnu parcha. Hamro support team hamesha tapaiko madat garna tayar chha.
question: Terms and conditions kahan dekhnasakchhu?
response: tapaiko event ko page ma 'Terms and Conditions' link cha, tyaha click garnuhos. Aba yo padhna milchha.

context: Event registration complete garnu agadi, tapaile sabai required fields fill garnuparcha. Email address ra phone number thik cha bhane double-check garnuhos.
question: Maile wrong email haleko jasto lagcha, maile kasari thik garna sakchhu?
response: tapai wrong email entry case ma hamro support team lai sampark garnuhos. Email support@example.com ma apno details pathaunuhos.

context: Hamro event registration system ko under, tapaiko personal data secure garinchha. Hamile GDPR compliance follow garna barsha prati badyachitt gariraheko chha.
question: Mero data secure chha ta?
response: Ho, tapaiko data hamile encrypt garera secure server ma store gareko chha.

context: Event ka tickets ko confirmation tapaiko email ma pathaune cha. Yedi email pauxa, kripaya spam/junk folder pani check garnuhos.
question: Maile ticket ko confirmation email payeko chaina, aba ke garne?
response: Kripaya spam/junk folder check garnuhos. Email confirm na bhae hamlai turunta sampark garnuhos.

context: Hamro refund policy anusaar, cancellation gareko ticket ko refund 7 din bhitra hamile process garera pathauncha.
question: Maile event ticket cancel gareko ho, refund kahile aauchha?
response: tapaiko refund process 7 din bhitra complete garnecha. Refund status ko lagi support@example.com ma sampark garnuhos.

context: Namaste! tapai hamro event registration platform ma aunu bhayeko ma dhanyabaad. Yaha tapaile upcoming events ko details padhna, tickets book garna, ra apno seat confirm garna saknuhunchha. Yedi ticket booking ko samaya ma kunai problem aayo jasto lagcha bhane, hamro support team lai sampark garnu. Hami 24/7 online cha ra email, chat, ya call bata help dinchu. Event registration process suru garna agadi, tapaiko profile ma details update cha ki chaina check garnuhos. Email address ra phone number accurate hunuparcha jasle tapai sanga sampark garna sajilo huncha.
question: Maile seat confirm garna khojda error ayo, ke garna milcha?
response: Pahila ta, tapaiko internet connection thik cha ki chaina check garnuhos. Aba pani problem aayo bhane, ticket confirm garna hamro live chat ma jana saknuhunchha ya email garnuhos: support@example.com. Hamile yo turunta solve garne pratibadhha chha.

context: Hami sabai events ka participants ko lagi suvidha purna registration process ko prabandha gariraheko chaun. Hamro ticketing system le multi-payment options, jasle credit card, debit card, ra eSewa jasto wallets support garne cha. Payment process secure SSL encryption ko maddat le chalcha, jasle tapaiko financial details safe rakcha. Ticket confirm garne bittikai, tapaiko registered email ma e-ticket pathaune system cha. Yedi tapai confirm email receive garnu bhaena bhane, kripaya apno spam ya junk folder check garnuhos. Aba pani confirm email chaina bhane hamlai sampark garnuhos.
question: Maile e-ticket ko confirmation email paudina, ke garna sakchhu?
response: Spam ya junk folder check garnuhos, tyaha pani chaina bhane email support@example.com ma apno details (ticket ID, email) pathaunuhos. Hami manually resend garna sakchhaun.

context: Event ko date ma change bhaeko bhaye, hami sabai participants lai turunta email ra SMS bata notify garne chhaun. Hamro priority cha ki sabai participants timely update pahun. Event reschedule huda ticket cancel garnu chahanchha bhane, tapai hamro refund policy anusaar full refund claim garna saknuhunchha. Refund ko lagi, hami tapailai 7-10 working days ko samaya ko guarantee dinchhaun. Refund claim garnu agadi, kripaya ticket details, registered email, ra payment method confirm garnuhos.
question: Event reschedule bhaera maile ticket refund chahanchhu, ke garna parcha?
response: Refund claim garnu ko lagi, tapai hamro refund request form fill garnuhos. Form hamro website ko support section ma cha. Kunai confusion cha bhane, email support@example.com ma sampark garnuhos.

context: Hamro event registration system ma, tapaiko data ko security hamro sabai bhanda thulo priority ho. tapaile diyekaa sabai information encrypted format ma rakheko huncha jasle unauthorized access ko risk hundaina. Hami international data protection laws (jasto ki GDPR) ko anusaran gariraheko chau. tapaiko account ma unusual activity dekhincha bhane, turuntai email garnuhos. Account security badhauna strong password set garnuhos ra two-factor authentication enable garnuhos.
question: Mero account hack bhaeko jasto lagcha, ke garna sakchhu?
response: Turunta password change garnuhos ra two-factor authentication enable garnuhos. Aba pani problem aayo bhane, hamlai support@example.com ma sampark garnuhos. Hami tapaiko account review garnechha.

context: Hamro event registration platform ma, sabai details transparent huncha. Event location, time, agenda, speakers ko list, sabai tapaiko dashboard ma available huncha. Event ma join garna ko lagi, ticket ko QR code email ma paunu huncha, jaslai scan garera tapaile entry linuhos. Event ko live streaming ko suvidha pani available cha. Yedi event attend garna physical location ma problem aayo bhane, live streaming option enable cha ki chaina check garnuhos. Kunai confusion cha bhane, hamlai sampark garnuhos.
question: Ma physical location ma jana sakdina, livestream kasari access garna milcha?
response: tapaiko dashboard ma 'Live Streaming' option huncha. Tyaha login garnuhos ra event ko streaming link access garnuhos. Aba problem bhae bhane hamlai email garnuhos.

context: Namaste! Hamro event registration platform ma sabai kura transparent cha, jasle tapailai sajilo parcha. Event ko schedule, location, price details ra agenda sabai clearly dekhaune cha. Event register garna agadi, tapaile FAQ section ma pani janchha saknuhunchha jaha tapaiko general queries ko jawab huncha. Yedi event ko time ma tapaiko location ma change cha bhane, tapailai email ra SMS bata notify garincha. tapaiko ticket confirm bhayepachi QR code sanga PDF format ma ticket mail garincha. Kunai confusion cha bhane, hamlai chat support ya email bata sampark garnuhos.
question: Mero event location change bhayeko ho, maile ke garna parcha?
response: tapai email ma pathaeko updated location details check garnuhos. Aba pani confusion cha bhane, hamlai turunta email garnuhos: support@example.com.

context: Hamro platform ma event registration process complete garna apno personal details jasto ki naam, email, phone number, ra payment details provide garna parcha. tapaiko details ko safety hamile SSL encryption use garera ensure garne garchhaun. Ticket confirm bhayepachi, email ma QR code ko ticket aauchha. Yedi tapaiko QR code properly scan hudaina bhane, manual entry ko suvidha pani huncha. Hamro support team yaha hamesha ready huncha tapaiko problem solve garna.
question: QR code scan hudaina, maile event ma kasari entry garna sakchhu?
response: tapai registration desk ma apno ticket ID ra naam dekhaunuhos. Hamro team le manual entry process garera tapaiko entry confirm garnechha.

context: Hamro event platform le tapaiko convenience ko lagi multiple payment gateways support garne garchha, jasle net banking, wallets, ra UPI options provide garchha. Yedi payment fail huncha bhane, retry garna agadi apno balance check garnuhos. Paisa deduct bhaera pani ticket confirm hudaina bhane, hamile tapaiko refund process within 48 ghanta ma suru garchhaun. Refund confirm garna ko lagi tapai hamro support team sanga sampark garna saknuhunchha.
question: Maile payment gareko paisa deduct bhaeko cha, tara ticket confirm hudaina. Aba ke garne?
response: tapaiko transaction ID ra email support@example.com ma pathaunuhos. Hami tapaiko issue turunta resolve garnechhaun.

context: Hamro platform participants ko lagi special early bird discounts provide garchha. Early bird tickets ko offer ko lagi coupon codes available huncha, jaslai checkout ma use garera discount pauna saknuhunchha. Discount apply hunu agadi, coupon valid cha ki chaina check garnuhos. Early bird tickets ko limited availability huncha, jasle tapaiko registration early garna motivation dincha. Discount related kunai confusion cha bhane, tapai FAQ section check garnuhos ya hamlai directly sampark garnuhos.
question: Maile coupon code enter garera discount pauna khojda apply hudaina, yo kasari fix garna sakchhu?
response: Kripaya coupon code valid cha ki chaina double-check garnuhos. Aba pani issue cha bhane, support@example.com ma apno details ra coupon code pathaunuhos.

context: tapaiko convenience ko lagi, hamro platform ma event reminders SMS ra email bata pathaune system cha. Event reminders ko timing customize garna, tapai apno profile settings ma 'Reminders' option use garera customize garna saknuhunchha. Default ma reminders 1 din ra 1 ghanta agadi send huncha. Yedi tapai reminder receive nagarnu cha bhane, tapai disable garna saknuhunchha.
question: Maile event ko reminder SMS receive gareko chaina, ke garna sakchhu?
response: tapai apno profile settings ma reminder notifications enabled cha ki chaina check garnuhos. Aba pani SMS chaina bhane, support@example.com ma inquiry garnuhos.

context: Event ma participate garna agadi, tapaiko ID verification garna parcha. tapaile apno original ID proof jasto ki Nagarikta, Passport, ya Driving License present garna parcha. ID verification process registration desk ma huncha, jasle tapaiko ticket confirm garera entry dincha. Duplicate ID use nagarnuhos, kinaki entry valid ID proof ma matra depend huncha. Yedi ID proof harayo ya problem cha bhane, registration desk sanga turunta sampark garnuhos.
question: Maile apno ID proof birseko ho, aba maile entry kasari garna sakchhu?
response: ID proof bhayeko kunai trusted person le lyauna milcha bhane lyaunuhos. Aba pani problem cha bhane, registration desk ma issue explain garnuhos. Hamro team alternative verify garna madat garnechha.

context: Hamro platform ma, event ka organizers le live poll, Q&A, ra surveys organize garna milcha jasle event ko interactivity badhauncha. tapai live poll ma participate garna apno dashboard ko 'Live Activities' section ma januhos. Surveys ko result event ko end ma publish garincha. Yedi survey ma participate garna ko lagi link kaam nagarcha bhane, hamro support team sanga sampark garnuhos.
question: Maile live poll ma participate garna khojda issue aayo, ke garna sakchhu?
response: tapaiko internet connection check garnuhos ra 'Live Activities' section refresh garnuhos. Aba pani problem cha bhane, support@example.com ma inquiry garnuhos.

context: Hamro platform le event attendees ko lagi post-event certificates ko suvidha provide garchha. Yedi event ma certificate available cha bhane, tapai registration ko samaya ma yo option select garna saknuhunchha. Event ko end pachi, certificate automatically tapaiko registered email ma send garincha. Digital certificate download garna ko lagi, tapai dashboard ko 'My Certificates' section ma januhos. Yedi certificate missing cha bhane, hamlai sampark garnuhos.
question: Maile certificate ko email receive gareko chaina, ke garna sakchhu?
response: Dashboard ko 'My Certificates' section check garnuhos. Aba pani problem cha bhane, support@example.com ma apno event details pathaunuhos.

context: tapaiko security hamro priority ho. Hamro platform ma apno account ko password reset garna sajilo cha. Yedi tapai password birsinu bhaeko cha bhane, login page ma 'Forgot Password' option ma click garnuhos. Tyaha apno registered email enter garnuhos ra password reset link paunuhos. Link le 15 minutes samma valid huncha, so turunta use garnuhos. Kunai technical issue aayo bhane hamlai inform garnuhos.
question: Maile password reset link ma click gareko ho, tara expire bhaeko jasto lagcha. Aba ke garne?
response: Kripaya feri 'Forgot Password' ma click garera naya reset link mag garnuhos. Aba pani issue solve hudaina bhane, support@example.com ma sampark garnuhos.

context: Event registration cancel garna ko lagi hami le easy refund policy provide gareka chau. tapai 'My Tickets' section ma gaera cancel garna saknuhunchha. Ticket cancel bhae pachi refund 7-10 din bhitra tapaiko original payment method ma aauchha. Refund related kunai issue cha bhane, hamro support team sanga sampark garnuhos. Late refund ko case ma, tapaiko bank sanga pani contact garna parna sakchha.
question: Maile ticket cancel gareko ho, tara refund ahile samma aayeko chaina. Aba ma ke garna sakchhu?
response: Refund processing ma 7-10 din lagna sakchha. Yo period bitisakepachi pani refund chaina bhane, kripaya hamlai support@example.com ma ticket ID ra transaction details pathaunuhos.

context: Hamro platform le multi-device support provide garchha jasle mobile, tablet, ra computer sabai bata access garna milcha. Yedi tapaiko ek device ma login cha bhane, arko device ma auto-login hunna, jasle security ensure garchha. Logout garera naya device ma login garna sajilo cha. Kunai technical issue cha bhane, tapaiko device update cha ki chaina check garnuhos. Aba pani login problem cha bhane, hamlai email garnuhos.
question: Mobile bata logout garera maile laptop bata login garna khojda kaam gareko chaina, aba ke garna sakchhu?
response: tapaiko login credentials check garnuhos ra browser cache clear garnuhos. Aba pani kaam nagare bhane, support@example.com ma email garnuhos.

context: Hamile events ka participants ko lagi on-the-spot help desk ko suvidha provide gareka chau. Yedi event ko time ma ticket ko issue, QR code scan problem, ya entry ko samasya aayo bhane, tapai help desk ma januhos. Help desk le turuntai apno problem resolve garnechha. Physical location ko address ra timings registration email ma send garincha.
question: Help desk ko location kasari thaha pauna sakchhu?
response: tapaiko email ma send gareko registration details check garnuhos. Aba pani information chhaina bhane, hamlai email garnuhos: support@example.com.

context: Event registration ko samaya ma sabai participants le apno ticket confirm garna chahanchhan. Yedi ticket ma mistake cha bhane, dashboard ko 'Edit Ticket' option le correction garna milcha. Edit option ma naam, email, ra phone number jasto fields change garna saknuhunchha. However, event ko din ma ticket edit garna milcha ki chaina yo policy event-specific huncha. Kunai duda cha bhane, hamlai contact garnuhos.
question: Maile ticket ma galti gareko ho, edit kasari garna sakchhu?
response: 'Edit Ticket' option ma jani mistake correct garnuhos. Aba edit option kaam nagare bhane, hamlai support@example.com ma sampark garnuhos.

context: Hamro event platform ma tapaiko event schedule customize garna pani option cha. Event ka parallel sessions cha bhane, tapai apno interest anusar sessions select garera apno schedule banana saknuhunchha. Schedule finalize bhayepachi dashboard ma 'My Schedule' section ma save huncha. Kunai technical issue cha bhane, tapaiko browser refresh garna try garnuhos.
question: Maile apno schedule customize garna khojda sessions save hudaina, aba ke garna sakchhu?
response: Browser refresh garnuhos ra feri try garnuhos. Aba pani problem solve hudaina bhane, support@example.com ma email garnuhos.

context: Namaste! Hamro platform ma event ke baare ma purna details jasto ki timing, speakers list, session agenda, ra lunch break timing sabai clearly mention huncha. tapaiko convenience ko lagi, lunch ra refreshment ko timing event ka organizers le pre-plan gareka huncha. response: Kripaya support@example.com ma apno event ID ra dietary requirements details pathaunuhos. Aba pani confusion cha bhane, hamlai email garnuhos.

context: Hamro event system le group registrations ko lagi pani facility provide garchha. Group registration ma discount policy ra participant ko naam entry ko lagi separate form available huncha. question: Maile group registration ma galat naam mention gareko ho, kasari thik garna sakchhu?
response: Dashboard ma jani 'Edit Group Tickets' option ma click garnuhos. Aba edit option available chaina bhane, support@example.com ma email garnuhos.

context: Hamro platform le post-event feedback ko lagi easy survey system provide garchha. Survey form event end bhayepachi automatically tapaiko email ma send huncha. Survey related technical issue cha bhane, hamlai contact garnuhos.

response: Email ko spam folder pani check garnuhos. Aba survey form chaina bhane, support@example.com ma apno email ID ra event details pathaunuhos.

context: Hamro event platform le speaker sessions ko live streaming facility provide garchha. Yedi tapai event ma physically present hunu saknuhunna bhane, live stream link dashboard ko 'Live Events' section ma available huncha. Internet connection stable cha bhane live stream ma problem hudaina. Technical difficulties ka case ma, live stream reconnect garna option huncha.
question: Maile live stream ma join garna khojda buffering problem ayo, ke garna sakchhu?
response: tapaiko internet connection check garnuhos. Browser refresh garnuhos ya live stream link feri open garnuhos. Aba pani problem solve hudaina bhane, support@example.com ma sampark garnuhos.

context: Event ka attendees le networking ko lagi dedicated app ko use garna saknuhunchha. App ma attendee list, contact sharing, ra private messaging feature available huncha. Networking app ma login garna ko lagi tapaiko registration ID cha bhane sajilo huncha. Networking ko lagi event-specific rules follow garna parcha, jasto ki spam messages na pathaune. Technical issue bhaye, networking app support team sanga sampark garna milcha.
question: Networking app ma login garna khojda registration ID invalid bhancha, aba ke garne?
response: tapaiko registration ID correct cha ki chaina check garnuhos. Aba pani kaam nagare bhane, support@example.com ma ID pathaunuhos.

context: Hamro event platform le hybrid events ko lagi dual-mode registration support garchha. Physical event ko saath-saathai virtual attendees ko lagi login credentials send garincha. Virtual participants ko lagi platform ma live chat, Q&A, ra session polls ko option huncha. Internet-related issue cha bhane, tapaiko session ko recording pani 24 ghanta bhitra dashboard ma available huncha.
question: Maile session live attend garna sakina, recording kasari access garna sakchhu?
response: Dashboard ma login garnuhos ra 'Session Recordings' section ma recording access garnuhos. Aba recording available chaina bhane, support@example.com ma inquiry garnuhos.

context: Hamro platform ko sponsors section ma event ka official sponsors ko details ra offers mention huncha. Offers expire date ko details sabai clearly dekhaune cha.

context: Hamro platform attendees ko lagi detailed invoices ko suvidha provide garchha. Payment confirm bhayepachi invoice automatic generate bhayera email ma send huncha. response: Dashboard ma 'My Invoices' section refresh garnuhos. Aba error solve hudaina bhane, support@example.com ma email garnuhos.

context: Namaste! Hamro platform ma tapaiko event ko preparation lai sajilo banaune suvidha haru cha. Event ka sabai attendees ko lagi pre-event checklist send garincha. response: tapaiko dashboard ma 'Event Preparation' section ma januhos. Aba checklist chaina bhane, support@example.com ma inquiry garnuhos.

context: Hamro platform le attendees ko feedback ko lagi after-event discussion forum ko suvidha provide garchha. Forum ma tapai apno experiences, questions, ra suggestions post garna saknuhunchha. question: Discussion forum ma login garna khojda credentials invalid bhancha, kasari fix garna sakchhu?
response: Kripaya apno email ma bheteko forum credentials verify garnuhos. Aba valid credentials sanga pani login hudaina bhane, support@example.com ma sampark garnuhos.

context: Hamro platform participants ko lagi custom badges design ko suvidha provide garcha. Badges ma tapaiko naam, designation, ra company logo customize garna milcha. context: Hamro platform le volunteers ko lagi dedicated training session ko suvidha provide garcha. context: Hamro platform attendees ko safety prioritize garcha. Event ma emergency protocols clearly define huncha jasto ki evacuation plan, first aid station ko location, ra emergency contacts. response: tapaiko dashboard ma 'Safety Guidelines' section check garnuhos. Aba pani thaha pauna garo cha bhane, onsite security desk ma contact garnuhos.

context: Hamro platform ma ticket transfer facility cha jasma tapai apno ticket arko vyakti lai transfer garna milcha. response: Transfer request ko status dashboard ma check garnuhos. Aba confirm bhayeko chaina bhane, support@example.com ma apno ticket ID pathaunuhos.

response: Dashboard ma 'Exclusive Offers' section check garnuhos. Aba QR code kaam nagare bhane, support@example.com ma email garnuhos.

context: Hamro platform event-specific reminders send garcha, jasma tapaiko session timings, lunch break schedule, ra important announcements include huncha. response: Dashboard ma 'My Schedule' section check garnuhos. Aba pani reminder confirm garna garo cha bhane, support@example.com ma apno event details pathaunuhos.

context: Hamro platform ma tapai apno registration ko history ra previous events ko details check garna saknuhunchha.
